description:
I've discovered that we have duplicated options in [DEFAULT] and [spice] sections

[DEFAULT]

# Host on which to listen for incoming requests (string value)
#html5proxy_host = 0.0.0.0

# Port on which to listen for incoming requests (integer value)
# Minimum value: 1
# Maximum value: 65535
#html5proxy_port = 6082

...

[spice]

#
# From nova
#

# Host on which to listen for incoming requests (string value)
#html5proxy_host = 0.0.0.0

# Port on which to listen for incoming requests (integer value)
# Minimum value: 1
# Maximum value: 65535
#html5proxy_port = 6082
title: Duplicated options #html5proxy_host and #html5proxy_port

comments.content:
I've discovered that we have duplicated options in [DEFAULT] and [spice] sections

[DEFAULT]

# Host on which to listen for incoming requests (string value)
#html5proxy_host = 0.0.0.0

# Port on which to listen for incoming requests (integer value)
# Minimum value: 1
# Maximum value: 65535
#html5proxy_port = 6082

...

[spice]

#
# From nova
#

# Host on which to listen for incoming requests (string value)
#html5proxy_host = 0.0.0.0

# Port on which to listen for incoming requests (integer value)
# Minimum value: 1
# Maximum value: 65535
#html5proxy_port = 6082
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~mjura

comments.content:
Fix proposed to branch: master
Review: https://review.openstack.org/266268
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack

comments.content:
Reviewed:  https://review.openstack.org/287685
Committed: https://git.openstack.org/cgit/openstack/nova/commit/?id=ccbe363f306c93ec3d2b19fbd6a84d1c1cd76b48
Submitter: Jenkins
Branch:    master

commit ccbe363f306c93ec3d2b19fbd6a84d1c1cd76b48
Author: Markus Zoeller <email address hidden>
Date:   Thu Mar 3 11:05:42 2016 +0100

    Sample nova.conf file has missing/duplicated config options
    
    The generated sample.nova.conf missed config options from these modules:
       nova.virt.hyperv.eventhandler
       nova.virt.libvirt.volume.aoe
       nova.virt.libvirt.volume.glusterfs
       nova.virt.libvirt.volume.iscsi
       nova.virt.libvirt.volume.iser
       nova.virt.libvirt.volume.net
       nova.virt.libvirt.volume.nfs
       nova.virt.libvirt.volume.quobyte
       nova.virt.libvirt.volume.remotefs
       nova.virt.libvirt.volume.scality
       nova.virt.libvirt.volume.smbfs
    
    The generated sample.nova.conf has the config options twice from module:
       nova.cmd.spicehtml5proxy.opts
    
    Change-Id: I81524527c204c56547d27a9450fffafa0f81c11e
    Co-Authored-By: Dirk Mueller <email address hidden>
    Co-Authored-By: zwei <email address hidden>
    Co-Authored-By: Michal Jura <email address hidden>
    Closes-Bug: #1532228
    Closes-Bug: #1533132
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack

comments.content:
Change abandoned by Matt Riedemann (<email address hidden>) on branch: master
Review: https://review.openstack.org/266268
Reason: Handled via https://review.openstack.org/#/c/287685
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack

comments.content: This issue was fixed in the openstack/nova 13.0.0.0rc1 release candidate.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~ttx
